mapper.sql: airport_id, airport_name, state, agent_num, province, city, country, address, longitude, latitude, dtflag, header_name, header_phone
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_airport ( airport_id, airport_name, state, agent_num, province, city, country, address, longitude, latitude, header_name, header_phone, dtflag, createtime, updatetime ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{state}, #{agentNum}, #{province}, #{city}, #{country}, #{address}, #{longitude}, #{latitude}, #{headerName}, #{headerPhone}, #{dtflag}, #{createdatetime}, #{updatedatetime} )

INSERT INTO sys_user_airport ( airport_id, sys_id, dtflag, user_type ) VALUES
(#{item.aid}, #{item.uid},#{item.dtflag},#{item.userType})
mapper.select: SELECT a.* FROM `sys_airport` a INNER JOIN `sys_user_airport` au ON a.`airport_id`=au.`airport_id` WHERE au.`sys_id`=#{id} AND a.dtflag=0 AND a.state=0
SELECT c.CID as 'id',c.`name` as 'name' FROM sys_city c JOIN (SELECT DISTINCT(a.province) FROM sys_airport a where a.dtflag=0 AND a.state=0 ) s ON s.province=c.CID;

select `airport_id`,`airport_name` from sys_airport sa where sa.airport_name =#{name}
and sa.airport_id!=#{id};
